title: Unlocking Her Chastity
description: When she crashes into me, running for her life, I know this vixen needs saving – but she is no damsel in distress.Juniper is an axe-wielding temptress who needs help with just one thing.She may be focused on the medieval chastity belt locked to her – but I am transfixed by her smile, her laugh– and her curves? Well, they certainly add to the package.And the package is more than I deserve this Christmas.I’m a mountain man who knows a thing or two about loss.But this woman seems to take it all in stride.She wants me to unlock her chastity belt, but is it possible that in turn she could unlock this closed off heart of mine?Dear Reader,This icy mountain man is lonely in Polar Bear, AK! It’s time we warm this feral alpha up! So light the fire, baby, it’s gonna get hot!Xo, FrankieCome join us in Polar Bear, Alaska where the days are short and chilly. And the nights, well, they’re long and frigid. The small, isolated town known for its yearly icy swim is overflowing with hunky, lonely men. These Mountain Men are waiting for their special soulmate to come along and heat things up.
author: Frankie Love
